title: Miss Match
description: Want to snag that certain someone? You need Miss Match!Sasha Finnegan has always had a knack for setting people up, and at sixteen, she's turned her talent into an online business, molding high school crushes into true love. But Sasha finds her toughest match yet when hottie Derek Urban asks her to set him up with Sasha's gorgeous sister, Maddie. It's not that Derek isn't a good catch. In fact, after spending so much time with him, Sasha can't help but think he's perfect - for her, that is.Can Sasha push her feelings aside for the sake of her business? Or has this miss finally found her match?
author: Wendy Toliver
